phrases: You are going to catch a cold, so let us...
I have got sand in my mouth, damn it.
Uroko-sama does not hold back at all.
You are not wrong at all, Akari!
Even I understand that, so why cannot the adults...
I am not going to give up!
Not on dad, not on the Ofunehiki...
Episode Eight: Beyond the Wavering Feelings
But this octopus looks really cool.
It is only got four arms.
It is because you are eating too fast.
I wonder if there is any more spares.
We need to go shopping for a few things now.
We have only two futons right now...
Oh, I will be staying at a friend's house.
I do not want to impose.
I think if I go to Tsumugu's place now, it will be...
All right, the guys will sleep together and the girls will sleep together tonight.
My father is the chief priest,
so considering he has the village's future to think about, I do not blame him.
I think I really should go to the sea with you, and...
Even if it is something everyone disapproves of.
If we can all eat hot meals together,
tell each other about our days,
Miori would sometimes look at the sea, too.
I do not want you to go through the same thing.
Let us have them forgive us, and get their blessing...
I really am happy right now.
What is so wrong with the two of them being together?
Are you having trouble with your Ena?
Do not surprise me like that.
Oh, this is just in case...
I mean, I do not want to dry up while I am asleep.
Mommy... used to do that a lot, too.
I also... disapproved for so long.
That is not how I feel now.
I could not do it again today.
It is embarrassing saying it to someone is face, huh?
Maybe there is something else you could do.
I do not have school tomorrow,
so why do not we go to the city and look for something?
We can have Manaka and the others help, too.
So my clothes are a bit big after all.
I did not know you guys got along so well.
So is that what they mean by boyfriend shirt?
What are you all dressed up for anyway?
Well, you said the city, so...
Anyway, we are not going to go play.
By the way, should not we get going?
By the way, if we miss that one, we will be stuck here for an hour.
Are you guys going to the city, too?
Oh, I have some plum-flavored kelp, too.
If you know the city pretty well,
after you are done with your errand, could you lead us around?
You really cannot smell the ocean here.
If we get lost here, our Ena might be in trouble.
It is not salt water, so there is no point jumping in.
You are just too easy to figure out.
Places with that mark have salt water for Ena.
but some places even have a space where you can use the water...
And some places just have the salt water out free to use.
That is pretty different from Oshiooshi.
We are going to leave you behind.
Do you see one you like?
there are tons of these just lying around in the sea.
It might be hard finding something here.
But there are other shops, too, okay?
We will meet back up at the top.
It was the seventh floor, right?
Would not you use the escalators usually?
Girls are pretty strong after all.
Akari-san decided on her own, right?
To leave the sea for the surface...
I wonder if she was able to decide because Itaru-san was there for her...
She might leave for the surface, too.
I do not know for sure yet,
but if that happens, I am going to support her.
You always try so hard to protect Manaka...
You have always liked her, right?
This would probably look good on Akari-san.
But it looked so good with the pendant...
It is cute because of this one piece.
It cannot be helped, with this temperature.
could we see the pendant on that mannequin?
Does it have to be an expensive one?
He is nice to everyone, is not he?
What do you think about him, Manaka?
Tsumugu-kun... can see things that I cannot realize.
So that is the real you.
I think... that is really amazing...
Manaka, you are able to say what you think now.
But I have decided that I will support her...
I thought there would be no chance with a guy from the surface...
But I was only thinking about myself,
and I did not think about her feelings at all.
But then I saw different sides of Manaka
and there was the whole thing with Akari.
So I decided that I want to make Manaka smile.
I do not think that means you need to disregard your feelings.
You do not have to change, Hikari.
If it is something that you have decided,
I think you are fine as you are...
I cannot put it into words well.
You really are a good person.
The fee for support is ten Gori Gori-kun Rich Bars.
Sorry to keep you guys waiting.
If that is not okay, I will work!
Maybe at Saya Mart or at a cafeteria, or at Triangle...
Could not this wait until Christmas or your birthday?
Just make sure you come home before it gets dark.
I guess it is hard to be the male parent when girls get to be about Miuna's age...
but the pendant in that poster is currently sold out...
Apparently they do not have that pendant anymore.
Do you want that pendant that badly?
with a she will from the sea I love so much.
So it just has to be like that one?
They might have it at another store.
I think it is up ahead somewhere.
All right, we will go there then.
Miuna, we are going to the next one!
I cannot let you dry up!
Hikari, did your Ena dry up?
So that is why this morning...
By the way, what about the thing you needed to get done?
Now that our Ena's recharged, we are going to find it no matter what!
Saya Mart would not have a cute one with shells, would they?
I hope they have one somewhere...
I collected some fish scales and gave it to Gramps,
and he said, What is this?
But Gramps has them with him even now.
I think what did be most important to Hikari's sister is the fact that you chose it.
I think I will head to the station after all...
I have got sand in my sandals...
I want to hurry up and take a bath.
You are giving this to me?
We looked around stores all day...
but we could not find one...
So you worked hard to make me one?
we all worked hard to find it.
I wanted to give you the thing I love, Aka-chan.
Would you have preferred something else?
Looks like all that snot-dripping did not go to waste.
you had snot dripping and you were all sticky!
I was just sticky from the salt water!
Not just be together, but properly...
I heard the saltflake snow fell on the surface...
The village is different than usual...
The sacred fire is going out faster lately.
I wonder if the Sea God is mad...
